name: Custom Optographs
description:
Bring your favorite 2D image into the 3D world as an Optograph. Let us turn a photo of a loved one into an epic tribute, take a plain 2D logo to a new 3D level, or make the ultimate topographic fan art. We are currently offering free consultations and image conversions, so you can get a preview of what your photo would look like before it is cut and rendered. Work with us to choose: the crop of your photo, the number of layers, the color scheme, and your choice of a black shadowbox frame or clear acrylic display case. Each Optograph is hand assembled with archival cover stock and construction-grade adhesive. Here is how our pricing works:
  • Free email consultation and image conversion.
Custom Optographs, all 8 layers deep:
  • 8 x 8", in black shadowbox frame - $250
  • 8 x 8", in clear acrylic display case - $350
  • 12 x 12", in black shadowbox frame - $400
  • 12 x 12", in clear acrylic display case - $500
Just email your photo to us first and we can proceed from there.

Some quick things to consider before emailing us a photo:

  1. Any raster image format will work, JPEG, PNG or compressed TIF. Resolution should be at least 72 dpi.
  2. Close-ups of the subject matter work best (obviously). But we are able to crop in or silhouette.
  3. Images with high contrast work best. If an image requires extensive retouching, we will have to quote you a price before proceeding.

If you aren't sure which photo will work best, it's okay to send us a few to look through. After you have approved your converted preview, come back here to make your final purchase. Thanks!

options.name: 8 x 8”, 8 layers deep, in black shadowbox frame
8 x 8”, 8 layers deep, in clear acrylic display case
12 x 12”, 8 layers deep, in black shadowbox frame
12 x 12”, 8 layers deep, in clear acrylic display case

description:
White Howlite is accented with potato pearls in this bead crocheted rope necklace. Glass beads and beaded clasp complete this wonderful piece. 

It is said that wearing or holding Howlite can help alleviate stress and anger. 

Length: 20"
Clasp: Beaded toggle clasp
Materials: White Howlite, Potato Pearls, Seed beads, Glass glass accent beads, Silver Plated Beads.
